name: CYCLE SELLING WEBSITE
description: Cycle selling website, where sellers can give sell posts for their used cycle. And the buyer can buy used cycle. Difference dashboards for users, sellers and admin.
FEATURES: A website for used cycle sales and buys.
Users can see products for his/her and can book them.
In Dashboard, the user can see My Orders. Where he/she can pay for the product and buy it.
Also, users can add to the wishlist for the next.
This website have also seller system. A user can be a seller while he signup.
A seller can give a sell post with all information of his/her product.
A seller can also advertise product, which will show in advertise section. Also seller can delete his/her product.
There is also admin system. An admin can control whole website. Admin can remove any user or seller. Also admin can verify the seller.
All user+seller+admin are stored in database.
Products are also stored in database.

name: HOTEL BOOKING WEBSITE
description: A website for booking hotel suites by location. Where a user can book a hotel suite of his choice.
FEATURES: User can book their desire hotel based on location.
Details are give by using many functionalities about every hotel.
After booking their suite, there is a payment page with total price.
User can see all hotels based on location
User can see details of every Hotel and can see how many types of suite are there.

name: FOOD E-COMMERCE
description: Food e-commerce website. Where food lover can buy their desire food based on category. Also admin can add food from dashboard.
FEATURES: Food selling based e-commerce website.
User can interact by giving their real time review.
There is an admin dashboard from where admin can add food.
Better UI with some of good functionalities.
Admin can control all over the website.

name: Dentist Booking Website
description: An Website where patient can see and book appointment slot to meet with dentist. Patient can select on his/her required day and time.
FEATURES: A website for a dentist.
Patient can book their slot to meet the dentist.
Patient can see when his/her appointment with doctor.
For successfully book the slot, patient must have to pay.
The slot is visible by availability.
Patient can book by on her/his required day.

name: Shopping E-Commerce
description: An E-Commerce Website where user can see and buy various kind of products. After adding into cart he/she can see his/her products in order section.
FEATURES: An E-Commerce Website.
Users can see products for his/her and can buy them.
In Dashboard, the user can see My Orders. Where he/she can pay for the product and buy it.
Products are also stored in database.
Good looking UI with lot of functionalities.

name: Top Gun Store
description: A website where are stored lots of gun. User can see in details of every gun. Then he/she can purchase it by adding to cart.
FEATURES: A website for Gun sell
Users can see gun for his/her and can buy them.
In Dashboard, the user can see My Orders. Where he/she can pay for the product and buy it.
Every Gun's details are visible in modal
Good looking UI with lot of functionalities.

name: Select Best V
description: A website where user can create his/her own Five A Side team by his favourite player from FC Barcelona
FEATURES: A website for selecting best V.
Users can create his/her own team.
Users can create team manager and coach.
User can calculate total cost.

name: Daily Politics News
description: A news website where reader can read daily top news around the world.
FEATURES: A newsletter website.
Reader can read news across all over the world.
Reader can add any news in his/her wishlist.
Reader can login via social media or even email sign-up

name: CSE FROM HOME
description: A online learning platform where students can enroll their desire course.
FEATURES: A website for online course.
Student can see in details every courses.
Student can download in pdf of every courses.
After selecting his/her courses, he/she also can pay online via SSL Commerz.
